content.html: 7. Knowing what's worth learning. Learning is important in our industry, but not everything is worth learning. Some patterns, technologies, or techniques will have a disproportionate impact on engineering careers. Knowing what's worth learning is just as important as learning.
content.value:
7. Knowing what's worth learning.

Learning is important in our industry, but not everything is worth learning.

Some patterns, technologies, or techniques will have a disproportionate impact on engineering careers.

Knowing what's worth learning is just as important as learning.
